column1: Hey, is that a hybrid?
Yeah, I like to be a part of the solution and not part of the problem. Well, anyway,  good for you!
This your bike?
It's on the impound list. You owe the county for tickets.
Yeah? Well my job is to tow this bike. You want it back? You talk to the county.
Thar look Skeeter! That's that guy from the TV!
Yeah. You like making fun of minorities, "nigger" guy? Huh we don't take kindly to social ignorance.
Michael Richards? Huh well, son of a bitch!
Well what is this? A "nigger" guy convention?
Come on, Skeeter.  These "nigger" guys ain't worth our trouble.
We've reached the rally site, Hildog.
Glad I picked you up, kid. It's dangerous for someone your age to be hitchhikin'
You goin' to Washington to visit family?
Hey! They just found the cure for AIDS! You just have to inject yourself with all your cash! Woohoo!
Ha... how much are you charging?
Aww- get in.
Ok-okay.
Aw... Aw yeah. Oh man oh... Ohh! Aw-aw-AWWW-aw. AW-aw. Oh, s-sorry I was so quick.
Awhuh! What?!
Oh Jesus, there's a little boy on the track.
It's pronounced "hoarder," young man, and if you are you should talk to the school counselor about it!
What's going on?!
An airport?! But...?
Yes, let him think!
What?!
No, the plane crashed. We're in the Colorado mountains somewhere.  Matt? Matt?!  My husband. He said the outbreak was all over the news, but everything was totally fine where he was.
Yes!
We have to kill him, before he infects everyone else!
Oh my God! Oh my God!
Yes!
Please, please hurry! It's important!
Please! We're running out of time!
What?! What is it, please?! Hurry, my husband might still be alive!
What are we going to do?
What if he attacks us first?
I haven't had the time to thank you, for doing what you've d-
What the hell are you doing, Kid?!
Hey!Â
Hi there, little lady.
Well, hopefully spending some time with you, gorgeous. Is $20 enough?
What? Oh-oh-uh, is this a bust?
Hey, wait a minute. You're just a kid!
Ow! Oo-uhow! Ow! Hey, man, what are you doing?! Ow, stop it!
Huuh?
What's that noise, officer?
Here we are, the end of the road. Alamosa Maximum Security Juvenile Hall.

We are now entering Ensenada, the second largest city on the Mexican Baja Peninsula.  We have now traveled over 2000 miles since leaving New York City. We'll just be stopping here for a few moments for gas, and then our tour will continue onto its final destination.
'Kay. What's stuck to the bottom of the bus?
Oh, goodness! We must have run over a little Mexican further up north. Is it okay?
Well, here's fifty for the gas.  Adios.
Well, well, what are doing out here?  You shouldn't be out walking the streets.
Can I interest you in some ice cream?
Alrighty, do you want this kind or this kind?
Hang on, we'll be back at camp in a matter of no time.
You'd better watch yourself next time, abandoner!
You damn kids!
You damn kids!
'Scuse me, is this the right road to Breckenridge.
Please, I just need to know if this is "South Park"?
Oh shit!
Worthy young lad, are you all right?
This year? Why it's 1776, it is.
Would you like a ride into town? I'm on my way to Master Thomas Jefferson's hosue to get a very important document, I am.
Never seen you around here, friend. Might you be from up North?
A flashback? Why, what is that?
Here we are, then. The current residence of Master Thomas Jefferson.
I'm afraid you'll have to wait here.
Sorry. Only the official messenger boy is allowed to talk to Mister Jefferson
Yes, ma'am. Where to?
Certified letter for the rock band MOOP?
Huh?
Haha, very funny, kid. Sit down and stop playing games.
What the hell?
Hey! That's Mel Gibson!
Well, what the hell does he want?!
You didn't like The Passion? But it shows how Christ suffered for you. Mel Gibson is a very spiritual man.
Sorry kid, we've got orders from corporate headquarters.
You're gonna have to talk to the higher-ups.
Bentonville, Arkansas. That's where Wall-Mart started, that's where all the bigwigs are.
There there now, let's just get you back home, shall we?
Wow, my friend Brittany was right. This is a really laid-back place.
Oh wow, you guys shouldn't be doing that. Don't you know what you're doing to the world?
We just spent our first semester at college. Our professors opened our eyes. The government is using its corporate ties to make you sell magazines so they can get rich.
Just hang with us for a bit. We'll fill you in on everything you haven't been told.
You see, the corporations take their profits and invest it in the war machine while keeping everyone blind.
Well, so my idea was this: Let's have like a week long music festival, draw everyone here, and then together, we can tear it all down.  Whoa, what the hell?!
Who was that?
Wow, this band is so crunchy. Dude, I need more weed.
You kids just haven't been to college yet. But just you wait, this thing is about to get HUGE.
Oh yeah, level four, sweet!
We didn't listen!
I'm going as fast as I can.
What the hell is goin' on?!
Stolen? You kids told me you won that whale at Pizza Hut!
Look, I didn't know nothin' about this.
